q_alicia_sparkle.title: A Sparkle for Laura
q_alicia_sparkle.description: Alicia wants to give Laura something special. Find a 'Glow Moss' in the dungeon's upper levels.

q_laura_gold.title: Raw Material
q_laura_gold.description: Laura needs a 'Cursed Gold Band' dropped by the Undead in the lower floors for a secret project.
